## Homework Guidelines

### Format Requirements

| Type | Format | Example |
|------|--------|---------|
| Numerical | Number with units | `104.5 degrees` or `104.5Â°` |
| Multiple choice | Letter only | `A` or `B` |
| Short answer | Brief phrase | `tetrahedral` |
| Calculation | Show work if requested | Step-by-step solution |

### Grading Rubric

| Score | Meaning |
|-------|---------|
| 100% | All correct |
| 80-99% | Minor errors |
| 60-79% | Partial understanding |
| Below 60% | Review material and retry practice |

### Academic Integrity

- Work independently unless collaboration is specified
- Do not share answers with classmates
- Use the practice system to prepare
- Ask questions during office hours if stuck
